by.chmut.giftit.dao

Interface CommentDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<java.lang.Long,Comment>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommentDaoImpl

    public interface CommentDao
extends Dao<java.lang.Long,Comment>
    The interface Comment dao implements the access mechanism required to work with the data source specifically for Comment entity.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
